pages.text: {"name":"Upload to COS","on":["push"],"jobs":{"build":{"runs-on":"ubuntu-latest","steps":[{"uses":"actions/checkout@v1"},{"name":"Install coscmd","run":"sudo pip install coscmd"},{"name":"Configure coscmd","env":{"SECRET_ID":"AKIDUklUysuEyTigPtu4mdG9MeiV1JMAheQ7","SECRET_KEY":"ZrrbASTJEtIPFrMeUZrvszqPlqg7HEI6","BUCKET":"hexo-1251170857","REGION":"ap-shanghai"},"run":"coscmd config -a $SECRET_ID -s $SECRET_KEY -b $BUCKET -r $REGION"},{"name":"Upload","run":"coscmd upload -rfs --delete ./ / --ignore \"./.git/*\""}]}}}
